channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wisconsin Public Schools Provide Sanctuary For Accused Groomers And Sex Abusers
item.description: A report finds, of the 461 teachers investigated for all forms of misconduct, 207 kept their licenses and were allowed to be around children.

item.title: The Left Would Rather Leave White House Lawn Buried In Rubble Than Allow Trump A Tangible Victory
item.description: It didn't take long for someone to go to court and attempt to seize control of the president's White House renovation project.

item.title: Donald Trump Has Broken the Progressive Ratchet
item.description: His changes will be difficult to reverse.

item.title: Celebrating Bill Buckley — and the Majesty of Our Nation’s Founding
item.description: The pursuit of freedom is the route to happiness.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent announces five finalists to replace Powell as Fed chairman

item.title: Trump refuses to rule out third term, points to polling and good physical exam
item.description: President Trump refused to rule out running for a third term while speaking with reporters on Monday, despite the Constitution limiting presidents to ...

item.title: Janet Mills, Not Susan Collins, Is the Real Threat to Maine Health Care
U.N.’s Global Carbon Tax Should Be a Wake-Up Call to Fight International Climate Extremism
item.description: The United States should take necessary action to kill off the IMO global carbon tax.

item.title: Pennsylvania Department Of Education Touts ‘Media Literacy’ For Kids While Pushing Left-Wing Sources
item.description: PDE's efforts to help kids navigate various sources is weakened by ideological taint, but it is doomed by a rejection of absolute truth.

item.title: Trump is willing to meet with North Korean leader Kim while he's in East Asia for APEC forum
item.description: President Trump said he would be willing to extend his Asia trip if North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un wanted to meet him.

item.title: Trump doesn't plan to meet Canadian PM Mark Carney during Asia trip, leaving trade in turmoil
item.description: President Trump said Monday he does not plan to meet Canada's leader "for a long time," signaling that his anger over an anti-tariff ad hasn't subside...

item.title: So Much for Diversity
item.description: A leading union of academic professionals is taking a stand — for ideological conformity.

item.title: Jay Jones’ ‘Community Service’ Scandal Is Worse Than You Think
item.description: It looks like much of Jay Jones’ court-mandated community service hours were spent advancing his and Democrats' political interests.
